divs: Sighting Details i saw no vehicles on the street.after i got up. it sounded like a lound buzzing sound. but only for a couple of seconds, i think. call it how yow want it, it felt like weird encounter. can anyone explain it? i live on a busy street and usually suffer insommnia. but this was different. yet explain where 7eral hours went after that noise. i write this thou it seems only an hour had passed. i slept well for a while, and then felt i should go outside, too see if it, or they were still were still there. diid anything else happen in this part of country?
Summary: Didn't see any oject, rather heard a buzzing sound.
